dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sdug bsngal la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong

ngo de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du ma rig pa la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la brtson pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par

rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am mi stong zhes bya bar yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/

mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa

smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed

rnams dang rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam/ 'gag pa'i chos

can zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam/ 'gag pa'i chos can zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs

dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag

par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

mig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig bdag

ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes

bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par

rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du

rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba

dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig skye zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang /

lce dang lus dang yid skye zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus

dang yid dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar

la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzugs rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams bdag yod pa 'am/ bdag med pa zhes

bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /

gzugs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar

yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams

dben zhes bya ba 'am mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams kun nas/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams skye ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/

dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi

khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ stong zhes

bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes

bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba 'am/ skye zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'phags

pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sngar ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du snga ma ji lta bar thams cad du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher sbyar ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la 'jug cing zhugs nas kyang gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor

mi 'byed do/ /gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes

pa dang / sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des phyi ma'i mtha'

nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag

par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /gzugs dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams

dang / rnam par shes pa dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni mig dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid dang

sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha'

nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /

mig dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar nang gi skye mched rnams la sbyar ba de bzhin du/ phyi'i skye mched rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor

mi 'byed do/ /de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' la yang ma yin zhing da ltar byung ba la yang mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /

de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang /

ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang /

phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden

pa rnams la yang rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i

mtha' dang da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /

'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor

mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rnam par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des mig nyid yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des yid nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams

dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gzugs rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams

dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par

shes pa'i khams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams

dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lus kyi khams

dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /

de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du kun

'byung ba'i bden pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des kun 'byung ba'i bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar

des lam gyi bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ma rig pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de

bzhin du rga shi'i bar dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /zhes de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rga shi'i bar nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ gzugs ni

tshor ba dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba ni 'du shes dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par

'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos gang yang chos

dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig ni rna ba dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rna ba ni sna dang lhan gcig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

sna ni lce dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lce ni lus dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lus ni yid dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams ni sgra dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sgra rnams ni dri dag dang lhan cig tu 'du bar yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /dri rnams ni ro dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /ro rnams

ni reg pa dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /reg pa rnams ni chos rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong

pa nyid kyi phyir chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa de bzhin du khams rnams la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi

bden pa ni/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni/ 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /

'gog pa'i bden pa ni lam gyi bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med

pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rga shi'i bar du yang sbyar ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos

gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa

nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su mi byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor bar mi byed do/ /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa

de ni 'du shes par mi byed do/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/ /

de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya

dang / chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams

ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /

dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i

rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bzhin du yid kyi

khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ma

yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni lam ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i bar du ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu

gzugs kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams

dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du mig

kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan ma yin te/ mig nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid mig go/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid

kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ yid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ yid nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid yid do/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ gzugs

rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ gzugs rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gzugs rnams so/ /de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/

chos rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ chos rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid chos rnams so/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ mig gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin

te/ mig gi khams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid mig gi khams so/ /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i

khams kyi bar du yang gzhan ma yin te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang

gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /de bzhin

du ma rig pa yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ ma rig pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid ma rig pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar yang gzhan la/ stong pa

nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rga shi'i bar yang gzhan ma yin te/ rga shi nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid rga shi'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma

yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de la ni 'grib pa med do/ /'phel ba med do/ /'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /de la ni gzugs med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /'du shes med do/ /'du byed rnams med do/ /

rnam par shes pa med do/ /de la ni mig med do/ /rna ba med do/ /sna med do/ /lce med do/ lus med do/ /yid med do/ /gzugs rnams med do/ /sgra rnams med do/ /dri rnams med do/ /ro rnams med do/ /reg rnams med do/ /chos rnams med do/ /de la

ni mig gi khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i khams med do/ /sgra'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /sna'i khams med do/ /dri'i khams

med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lce'i khams med do/ /ro'i khams med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi khams med do/ /reg pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /

yid kyi khams med do/ /chos kyi khams med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /de la ni sdug bsngal med do/ /kun 'byung ba med do/ /'gog pa med do/ /lam med do/ /de la ni ma rig pa med do/ /ma rig pa 'gag pa med do/ /

'du byed rnams med do/ /'du byed 'gag pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med do/ /ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do/ /skye mched drug med do/ /skye mched drug 'gag pa med

do/ /reg pa med do/ /reg pa 'gag pa med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /tshor ba 'gag pa med do/ /sred pa med do/ /sred pa 'gag pa med do/ /len pa med do/ /len pa 'gag pa med do/ /srid pa med do/ /srid pa 'gag pa med do/ /skye ba med do/ /

skye ba 'gag pa med do/ /de la ni rga shi med do/ /rga shi 'gag pa med do/ /de la ni 'thob pa med do/ /mngon par rtogs pa med do/ /de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa med do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba med do/ /lan cig phyir

'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /dgra bcom pa med do/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /rang byang chub med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /de la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med do/ /

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la brtson pa 'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson pa 'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson pa 'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la brtson pa 'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson pa 'am/ mi

brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson pa 'am mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /de ji lta ji

ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su

dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob pa de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /

nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /des 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed cing / de bzhin du lta ba thams

cad dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye ste/ rtag tu brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing

nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam

yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la

brtson pa mi 'dor bar rtag tu de ltar brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad zil gyis mnan nas gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mngon

par sgrub bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/ nam yang ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang /

rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po

dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong mngon par grags pa rab tu mang po dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba

pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog /pha rol du phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ pha rol du phyin pa rab mchog /pha rol du phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa/ pha rol du phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ pha rol du phyin pa zhi ba dul ba/ pha rol du phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa/ pha rol du phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid pha rol du phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rgyas pa/ pha rol du phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa mi rdzi ba nyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal ba/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa'i lus thob pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thob pa rnams kyis ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin par ji skad bstan pa bzhin

du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du mi

mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags

so/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du

gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i

chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bar du gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol du mchi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal

'byor gyis gnas par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shes ldan dag rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin

no/ /shes ldan dang rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes ldan dang rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du

bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri pa las rnal 'byor gyis le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes de skad ces bka' stsal

na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de dag dang / rtag tu ma bral bar gnas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin

snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam

'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams byang chub sems
dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems

dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/

gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa

ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji

snyam du sems/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems

dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de

bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dag las gzhan zhig byang

chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi khams kyi bar dag las gzhan zhig byang chub sems

dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams

dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

ma rig pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa'

yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du

byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub

sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol

pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i

bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du

sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig /byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam

'am de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du

sems/ mig gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa'

yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /

shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji

snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid

las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ 'di skad du gzugs

byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/ gzugs las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing /

de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin te/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub

sems dpa' gzhan ma yin zhes zer/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma mchis pa mi dmigs na/ de byang chub sems dpar

'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga

la mchis/ rga shi las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ de bzhin

du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis te/ de dag ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa

ti'i bu legs so legs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bdag yod pa'i

tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par

shes pa bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs stong pa'i

tshig bla dgas sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par

shes pa stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig

bla dgas sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs smon

pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du

sems/ gzugs zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du

byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs

dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams

dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs

kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du

shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa

ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu

'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam

du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan

'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang /

sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi

rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas

sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshigs bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i

tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug
bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag

med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag yod pa'i tshig

bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/

mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong pa'i tshig bla dgas
sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/

mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid mtshan ma yod pa'i

tshig bla dgas sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/

smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas

sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub

sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol

pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang

chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin

snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin

snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol

pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam

du sems/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla

dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas

sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla

dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyi bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal

ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla

dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i

tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang

rnams zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi

dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams dben pa'i tshig bla dgas

sam mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par

byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kun nas nyon mongs

pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag

pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i

tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub

sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems

dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags

so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de bzhin

du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig

gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar rtag

pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi

rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma

lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag

med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes

pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa

ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mtshan ma med

pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /

de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i

bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang

chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid

kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams

dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/

gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi

skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi skye ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi

rnam par shes pa'i khams dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma

lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig

pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig

pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig

pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du

sems ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu

'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /

shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags

so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma

lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam

'am gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'di skad du gzugs

kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas

ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/

mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ dben pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ mi dben pa'i tshig

bla dgas ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ skye ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i tshig

bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/

de bzhin du mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du mig rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub

sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos

po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/

de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi

tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi

khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi

khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma

yin de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du yid kyi

rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems

dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems

dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang / dngos po med

pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs gtan mi dmigs lags

na gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa

gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs

bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags

so btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du

byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs stong zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la

mchis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs

kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ smon pa ma

mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das gzugs zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa

yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas

byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs skye zhes bgyi ba 'am/ 'gag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs

lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs dngos po mchis

zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags

so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig rtag

ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig

bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

mig bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das mig stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das mig smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das mig dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig kun

nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig skye zhes bgyi ba

gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs

lags na/ mig dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs

kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams mi

rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs

rnams sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams bdag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags

na gzugs rnams bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi

dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams mtshan

ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos

rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos

rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa

dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/

sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar
